author: JILL COLVIN, ZEKE MILLER and GEOFF MULVIHILL / AP
title: ‘The Authority Is Total’: Trump Says It’s His Call, Not the States, When to Ease COVID-19 Restrictions
description: President Donald Trump claimed the authority of when to reopen the economy after weeks of coronavirus social distancing guidelines.
content: WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump claimed the authority Monday to decide how and when to reopen the economy after weeks of tough social distancing guidelines aimed at fighting the new coronavirus. But governors from both parties were quick to push back, not… [+6277 chars]
